room_title: Escape room "Solvit Funeral Home" by Bayou Escape Rooms in Lake Charles
room_address: 1440 W McNeese St Lake Charles, LA 70605
room_description: A Lake Charles funeral director, Will U. Solvit, went missing decades ago and authorities still have no leads. It is haunted by the ghosts of Mr. Solvit and his murderer. The ghost of Mr. Solvit's murderer has left devious puzzles to taunt investigators, while Mr. Solvit has left clues to help avenge his death. Can you figure out who killed Mr. Solvit in 60 minutes or less?
